languages.text: "Он сам и не знал, как именно сведения приходили к его агентам. Но по их составу и деталям было ясно: ни один мон-кай в реальном мире не смог бы собрать такие подробности о составе и целях рейдов. Нет, немыслимо. Информацию скармливали вам мои же сородичи. И я знал, кто. Иремерисс Эзирраеш, архонт Опустошительной бури, моя бывшая владыка. Трусливая дрянь, нашедшая управу на тех, кто грозил ее власти. Я знал, что в войне с ней мне нужна поддержка покровителя Опустошительной бури — кабала Черного Сердца. Так я вступил в альянс с Назракеем, что председательствовал на суде. Я обещал ему унижение Иремерисс. Свидетельство низкого мон-кай, которое обречет ее на падение в глазах архонтов. Для этого представления мне нуж{mf|ен|на} был{mf||а} ты".

traits.locale_text: "Я так и не смог добиться, от кого именно он получал данные. Но по их составу и деталям понял одно: ни один мон-кай в реальном мире не смог бы собрать такие подробности о составе и целях рейдов. Нет, немыслимо. Информацию скармливали вам мои же сородичи. И я знал, кто". {n}Голос Маражая превращается в рык.{/n} "Та, кто скормила своих конкурентов дрессированным мон-кай. Иремерисс Эзирраеш, архонт Опустошительной Бури. Трусливая сука, трясущаяся за свое место и нашедшая способ избавиться от меня. Я знал, что в войне с ней мне нужно поручительство кабала Черного Сердца. Так я вступил в альянс с Назракеем, что председательствовал на суде. И так я решил, что для представления в суде мне нуж{mf|ен|на} ты".

languages.text: "How the information was reaching his agents, the burned mon-keigh himself did not even know, but based on the units involved and other details it was clear: no mon-keigh in realspace could have gathered such specifics about raid complements and objectives. No, it was inconceivable. The information was being fed to you by my own kind. And I knew who. Yremeryss Aezyrraesh, Archon of the Reaving Tempest, my former mistress. A cowardly bitch who punishes anyone who threatens her grip on power. I knew that to win a war against her I would need the support of the Reaving Tempest's patron — the Kabal of the Black Heart. So I allied with Nazrakhei, who presided over the trial. I promised him that Yremeryss would be humiliated. I promised him evidence — a lowly mon-keigh that would disgrace Yremeryss in the eyes of the Archons. For that performance, I needed you."

languages.text: «El mon-keigh quemado no tenía ni idea de cómo estaba llegando la información a sus agentes, pero dadas las unidades involucradas y otros detalles similares, estaba claro. Ningún mon-keigh del espacio real podría obtener esa clase de detalles sobre las fuerzas y los objetivos de las incursiones. Era algo inconcebible. La información tenía que venir de alguien de mi pueblo y yo sabía quién. Yremeryss Aezyrraesh, Arconte de la Tempestad Asoladora, mi anterior señora. Una furcia cobarde que castiga a cualquiera que amenace su poder. Sabía que si iba a ganar una guerra contra ella necesitaría el apoyo de los patrocinadores de la Tempestad Asoladora, la Kábala del Corazón Negro. Así que me alié con Nazrakhei, que presidió el juicio. Le prometí que Yremeryss sería humillada. Le prometí pruebas: un{mf||a} mon-keigh que dejaría a Yremeryss en desgracia ante los Arcontes. Para eso te necesitaba».
languages.original_text: "How the information was reaching his agents, the burned mon-keigh himself did not even know, but based on the units involved and other details it was clear: no mon-keigh in realspace could have gathered such specifics about raid complements and objectives. Para eso te necesitaba».

languages.text: “至于那些情报究竟是怎么传到他手下的特工那里，就连那个烧坏了脸的猴子本人都不清楚。但那些情报涉及到的部队，以及其他信息，却很清楚地揭露了事实。身处真实世界的猴子，根本不可能了解这么具体的情报，不可能弄清楚袭击的补给与目标。不，这根本就不可能，那些情报肯定是我的族人泄露给你们的。我知道是谁干的，那个人就是伊芮梅莉斯·艾泽拉什，狂风阴谋团的执政官，我曾经的女主人。那个懦弱的臭婊子，谁会威胁到她的权力，她就会收拾谁。那个时候我意识到，如果想战胜她，我就必须得到狂风阴谋团的庇护主——黑心阴谋团的支持。于是，我和负责主持审判的纳札骸结为了同盟。我向他保证，伊芮梅莉斯必将会受到羞辱。我承诺他我会带来证据，我会把一只低贱的猴子带到那里，让伊芮梅莉斯在所有执政官面前颜面尽失。为了这场好戏，我需要把你带过去。”
languages.original_text: "How the information was reaching his agents, the burned mon-keigh himself did not even know, but based on the units involved and other details it was clear: no mon-keigh in realspace could have gathered such specifics about raid complements and objectives. No, it was inconceivable. The information was being fed to you by my own kind. And I knew who. Yremeryss Aezyrraesh, Archon of the Reaving Tempest, my former mistress. A cowardly bitch who punishes anyone who threatens her grip on power. I knew that to win a war against her I would need the support of the Reaving Tempest's patron — the Kabal of the Black Heart. So I allied with Nazrakhei, who presided over the trial. I promised him that Yremeryss would be humiliated. I promised him evidence — a lowly mon-keigh that would disgrace Yremeryss in the eyes of the Archons. For that performance, I needed you."

languages.text: 「情報がどのようにして諜報員に届いたのか、火傷を負ったモン＝ケイですら知らなかったが、関与した部隊やその他の詳細を考えると、リアルスペースのモン＝ケイが、襲撃の数と目的についてこれほど細かな情報を得ることは不可能だったというのは明らかだ。いや、それはあり得ないことなんだ。情報は俺の仲間がお前に届けた。俺の知っている者だ。イレメリス・エジルラシュ、リーヴィング・テンペストの執政官であり俺の元愛人。自分の権力を脅かす者を痛めつける卑怯な雌犬だ。あの女との戦いに勝つには、リーヴィング・テンペストの後援者であるコルズ・ヴレックスの協力が必要となることはわかっていた。そこで俺は、裁判を取り仕切ったナズラクヘイと同盟を結んだ。俺はイレメリスに恥をかかせてやると彼に約束した。アーコンの前ではイレメリスにとって恥となるであろう身分の低いモン＝ケイを証拠として連れてくると。そのためにはお前が必要だった」
languages.original_text: "How the information was reaching his agents, the burned mon-keigh himself did not even know, but based on the units involved and other details it was clear: no mon-keigh in realspace could have gathered such specifics about raid complements and objectives. No, it was inconceivable. The information was being fed to you by my own kind. And I knew who. Yremeryss Aezyrraesh, Archon of the Reaving Tempest, my former mistress. A cowardly bitch who punishes anyone who threatens her grip on power. I knew that to win a war against her I would need the support of the Reaving Tempest's patron — the Kabal of the Black Heart. So I allied with Nazrakhei, who presided over the trial. I promised him that Yremeryss would be humiliated. I promised him evidence — a lowly mon-keigh that would disgrace Yremeryss in the eyes of the Archons. For that performance, I needed you."

languages.text: « Quant à la manière dont ces informations parvenaient à ses agents, le mon-keigh brûlé lui-même l'ignorait, mais à en juger par les unités impliquées, entre autres détails, la réponse était évidente : aucun mon-keigh dans l'espace réel n'aurait pu en apprendre aussi long sur nos effectifs et objectifs. Non, c'était tout bonnement inconcevable. De toute évidence, les fuites venaient de mon propre camp. Et il ne m'a pas fallu longtemps pour identifier la félonne. Yremeryss Aezyrraesh, archonte de la Tempête ravageuse, mon ancienne maîtresse. Une chienne sans aveu qui punit quiconque représente une menace envers son précieux pouvoir. Pour remporter une guerre face à elle, je savais que j'aurais besoin du soutien de ses supérieurs, la Kabale du Cœur Noir. Alors, je me suis allié à Nazrakhei, qui présidait le tribunal. Je lui ai promis qu'Yremeryss serait dûment humiliée et je me suis engagé à lui fournir des preuves à charge en la personne d'un mon-keigh inférieur qui la discréditerait aux yeux de ses homologues. Et pour ce faire, j'avais besoin de vous. »
languages.original_text: "How the information was reaching his agents, the burned mon-keigh himself did not even know, but based on the units involved and other details it was clear: no mon-keigh in realspace could have gathered such specifics about raid complements and objectives. No, it was inconceivable. The information was being fed to you by my own kind. And I knew who. Yremeryss Aezyrraesh, Archon of the Reaving Tempest, my former mistress. A cowardly bitch who punishes anyone who threatens her grip on power. I knew that to win a war against her I would need the support of the Reaving Tempest's patron — the Kabal of the Black Heart. So I allied with Nazrakhei, who presided over the trial. I promised him that Yremeryss would be humiliated. I promised him evidence — a lowly mon-keigh that would disgrace Yremeryss in the eyes of the Archons. For that performance, I needed you."

Et pour ce faire, j'avais besoin de vous. »

languages.text: "Wie die Informationen seine Agenten erreichten, das wusste nicht einmal der verbrannte Chem-pan-sey selbst. Doch basierend auf den beteiligten Einheiten und anderen Details war klar: Kein Chem-Pan-Sey im Realraum hätte solche Details über Angriffstrupps und -ziele sammeln können. Nein, es war nicht vorstellbar. Jemand aus meinem Volk musste Euch diese Informationen füttern. Und ich wusste auch wer. Yremeryss Aezyrraesh, die Archontin des plündernden Sturms, meine ehemalige Herrin. Eine feige Hure, die jeden bestraft, der ihre Macht bedroht. Ich wusste, um einen Krieg gegen sie zu gewinnen, würde ich die Unterstützung des Patrons des plündernden Sturms benötigen — der Kabale des Schwarzen Herzens. Daher habe ich mich mit Nazrakhei verbündet, der dem Prozess vorstand. Ich habe ihm versprochen, dass Yremeryss gedemütigt werden würde. Ich habe ihm Beweise versprochen — einen niederen Chem-Pan-Sey, der Yremeryss in den Augen der Archonten entehren würde. Und für diese Darbietung brauchte ich Euch."
languages.original_text: "How the information was reaching his agents, the burned mon-keigh himself did not even know, but based on the units involved and other details it was clear: no mon-keigh in realspace could have gathered such specifics about raid complements and objectives. No, it was inconceivable. The information was being fed to you by my own kind. And I knew who. Yremeryss Aezyrraesh, Archon of the Reaving Tempest, my former mistress. A cowardly bitch who punishes anyone who threatens her grip on power. I knew that to win a war against her I would need the support of the Reaving Tempest's patron — the Kabal of the Black Heart. So I allied with Nazrakhei, who presided over the trial. I promised him that Yremeryss would be humiliated. I promised him evidence — a lowly mon-keigh that would disgrace Yremeryss in the eyes of the Archons. For that performance, I needed you."

languages.text: "Bilginin ajanlara nasıl ulaştığını yanık mon-keigh de bilmiyordu ama işin içindeki birimleri ve diğer ayrıntıları da göz önünde bulundurunca her şey açıklığa kavuştu. Gerçekuzaydaki hiçbir mon-keigh, baskına katılacakları ve amaçlarını bilemezdi. Böyle bir şey mümkün değildi. Şüphesiz ki bu bilgiyi sızdıran, benim türümden biriydi. Kim olduğunu da biliyordum. Müfteris Kasırga Arkonu Yremeryss Aezyrraesh... Eski efendim... Makamına tehdit olarak gördüğü herkesi harcayan o kahpe... Onu alt etmek için Müfteris Kasırga'nın hamisinden, Kara Yürek Kabalı'ndan destek almam gerekeceğini de biliyordum. Ben de mahkemeye başkanlık eden Nazrakhei'le birlik oldum. Yremeryss'i rezil edeceğimize söz verdim. Yremeryss'i Arkonların gözünden düşürecek bir kanıt... Yani aşağılık bir mon-keigh getirme sözü de verdim. Bu noktada da sana ihtiyaç vardı."
languages.original_text: "How the information was reaching his agents, the burned mon-keigh himself did not even know, but based on the units involved and other details it was clear: no mon-keigh in realspace could have gathered such specifics about raid complements and objectives. No, it was inconceivable. The information was being fed to you by my own kind. And I knew who. Yremeryss Aezyrraesh, Archon of the Reaving Tempest, my former mistress. A cowardly bitch who punishes anyone who threatens her grip on power. I knew that to win a war against her I would need the support of the Reaving Tempest's patron — the Kabal of the Black Heart. So I allied with Nazrakhei, who presided over the trial. I promised him that Yremeryss would be humiliated. I promised him evidence — a lowly mon-keigh that would disgrace Yremeryss in the eyes of the Archons. For that performance, I needed you."

traits.locale_text: "Bilginin ajanlara nasıl ulaştığını yanık mon-keigh de bilmiyordu ama işin içindeki birimleri ve diğer ayrıntıları da göz önünde bulundurunca her şey açıklığa kavuştu. Gerçekuzaydaki hiçbir mon-keigh, baskına katılacakları ve amaçlarını bilemezdi. Böyle bir şey mümkün değildi. Şüphesiz ki bu bilgiyi sızdıran, benim türümden biriydi. Kim olduğunu da biliyordum. Yremeryss Aezyrraesh, Müfteris Kasırga'nın Arkon'u... Eski efendim... Makamına tehdit olarak gördüğü herkesi harcayan o kahpe... Onu alt etmek için Müfteris Kasırga'nın hamisinden, Kara Yürek Kabalı'ndan destek almam gerekeceğini de biliyordum. Ben de mahkemeye başkanlık eden Nazrakhei'le birlik oldum. Yremeryss'i rezil edeceğimize söz verdim. Yremeryss'i Arkonların gözünden düşürecek bir kanıt... Yani aşağılık bir mon-keigh getirme sözü de verdim. Bu noktada da sana ihtiyaç vardı."
